scripts.gcp:deploy: gcloud config set project ai-notes-hackathon && gcloud run deploy app --image gcr.io/ai-notes-hackathon/app --platform managed --region us-central1 --port 8080
scripts.pipeline:deploy: docker build -t gcr.io/ai-notes-hackathon/app . && docker push gcr.io/ai-notes-hackathon/app && gcloud config set project ai-notes-hackathon && gcloud run deploy app --image gcr.io/ai-notes-hackathon/app --platform managed --region us-central1 --port 8080
